quote: If you want to be all like smart and adult about this shit then do the right thing. But if you want to do something fun and take a chance, then screw what anyone else thinks. Rock and roll, man!
quote_letters: IF YOU WANT TO BE ALL LIKE SMART AND ADULT ABOUT THIS SHIT THEN DO THE RIGHT THING BUT IF YOU WANT TO DO SOMETHING FUN AND TAKE A CHANCE THEN SCREW WHAT ANYONE ELSE THINKS ROCK AND ROLL MAN
